snippet: After Syrian state television displayed a stack of foreign currency, apparently to prove that rebels in Homs were paid agents, bloggers gave the bills a closer look and discovered them to be small denominations of extinct currencies.
abstract: After Syrian state television displayed a stack of foreign currency, apparently to prove that rebels in Homs were paid agents, bloggers gave the bills a closer look and discovered them to be small denominations of extinct currencies.

headline.main: Syrian Television's Underwhelming Evidence of Foreign Backing for Rebels
